Plot: Come to a new House Party, where Kid, after a lifetime 'playing the field', falls in love and is about to get married. 'Play' plans to throw the rockin'est bachelor party ever - until '...
Title: House Party 3
Writer: Reginald Hudlin (characters), David Toney (story), Takashi Bufford (story), Takashi Bufford (screenplay)
Actors: Christopher Reid, Christopher Martin, David Edwards, Angela Means
